data.name: The Hillock Ahmedabad
data.description: The Hillock Ahmedabad a fine balance of artistic luxury & individual insights. Inspired by Classical European architecture our Boutique Hotel in Ahmedabad is a seamless blend of the old & the new. The magnificent façade of the property sets a high benchmark of expectations. And we believe we meet those expectations by combining impeccable service and striking interiors. With the extensive use of marble, mosaic, rich fabrics and wooden textures, one’s attention is naturally drawn to the interiors. But a closer look reveals that there’s more to the property. We pride ourselves in the personalized attention we give our guests, offering the perfect balance between business & leisure. So join us, as we elevate your experience. The Hillock Ahmedabad a luxury hotel is located in the commercial district of S.P.Ring Road in Ahmedabad. Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport is 15 minutes away, while the prominent business hubs like The Mahatma Mandir Convention Centre is a 20 minutes, Gujarat High Court is 5 minutes, Sanand 35 minutes, and GIFT city 20 minutes from the property. Our pillarless ‘Royal Ballroom’ is ideal for Social and conferences or special events. We are located at one of the city's fastest growing business districts. Our Ahmedabad luxury hotel is also close to all major business parks, CBD shopping mall and the Gandhi Ashram. We offer 49 spacious palatial guest rooms including 15 Junior Suites with balcony, terrace and 1 Executive suite these will provide wow! Factor and an unforgettable experience to the guest. The Dining options – TREVI- all-day dining offers modern Indian and International flavours and The Veranda offers a special gourmet cuisine option. See why so many travellers make The Hillock, Ahmedabad their hotel of choice when visiting Ahmedabad. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a luxury setting with an array of amenities designed for travellers like you. Ahmedabad is also known for some great historic sites, including Sabarmati Ashram, Mahatma Gandhi's Home, Sidi Saiyyed's Mosque, and Dada Hari Ni Vav, which are not too far from The Hillock, Ahmedabad. We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at The Hillock Ahmedabad as you experience all of the things Ahmedabad has to offer. Come and enjoy a “Regal” stay with us.

data.name: Vivanta Ahmedabad SG Highway
data.hotel_class_attribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
data.description: Come, discover the bold new vibe of Ahmedabad. Stylish, cosmopolitan and bold, Vivanta Ahmedabad is ideal for business travellers and cultural explorers alike. Conveniently located on the arterial SG Highway, it offers easy access to key business districts, historical sights, important civic buildings and high-end medical facilities. Featuring 176 stylish rooms including 13 suites, three unique dining venues and 540 sq. mt. of versatile banqueting space, the contemporary hotel is designed to play host to corporate meetings, intimate weddings, social celebrations and delegations. At Mynt, our sleek and high-energy all-day diner, enjoy the perfect blend of style and taste with international flavours and Gujarati favourites. Swirl, our lobby level patisserie and delicatessen satiates sweet cravings with one-of-a-kind desserts as well as a selection of coffees and teas from around the world. At Indus, the intricate décor is inspired by Tree of Life carvings, while the menu features fine specialties from the northwest frontier region. Located at the lobby level our Fitness Centre features ultra-modern Stex equipment for functional training and intense power workouts. Escape to infinite bliss in the 74 sq. mt. outdoor pool that is exclusively for resident guests, ideal for relaxing after an invigorating day of business meetings or sightseeing.

Four Points by Sheraton Ahmedabad has a great location in the heart of the city. We are just 10km from Ahmedabad airport, 3km from the railway station and 1.5km from Paldi bus station. Shopping is just minutes away from our door. Our well-equipped meeting rooms and pre-function area totals 288 square meters. Let our team of dedicated professionals work with you to host your special event. Whether you are in town for business or leisure, convenience, comfort and value are everywhere at Four Points by Sheraton Ahmedabad.

data.description: Courtyard by Marriott, Ahmedabad is ideally located in Gujarat, Ahmedabad, India's commercial capital with easy access to the Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International airport as well as SG Highway, one of the city's fastest growing business districts. Our Ahmedabad luxury hotel is also close to all major business parks, Gujarat's largest shopping mall, world-class cinemas, the Gandhi Ashram and Shaking Minarets. We offer 164 spacious contemporary guest rooms including 6 Deluxe and 6 Executive suites, complete with in-room laptop size safes, LCD panels, iHome docking station, Wi-Fi Internet and workstations that support all your business needs. Facilities include an Executive Lounge, 24-hour fitness centre, swimming pool, Ode Spa and state-of-the-art meeting and banquet spaces. We offer 3 restaurants - MoMo Cafe, Bayleaf and Java+ each special in a versatile cuisine.

data.name: Lemon Tree Premier; The Atrium, Ahmedabad
data.hotel_class_attribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
data.description: On the bank of Sabarmati, overlooking the riverfront, lounges this plush and stylish hotel, enhanced by landscaped greens and a serene water body. Large glass doors invitingly usher you into this classic boutique hotel with an atrium lobby dressed in soft leather and remarkable modern art. Contemporary and inviting, the lobby adorns an elegant look accentuated by a large pristine crystal chandelier, two stylish capsule elevators and several seating areas making it a perfect setting for private meetings and idle conversations. The hotel is designed to attract the millennium traveler with its 63 spacious and well appointed rooms and suites, a 24x7 multi-cuisine coffee shop– Citrus Café, with an interactive kitchen, and The Riverfront Grill, a picturesque alfresco grill and barbeque restaurant, which directly overlooks the Sabarmati river; besides a fully equipped gym and the largest indoor swimming pool in the city. Wake up to the picturesque view of the river from most rooms, trot at the joggers trail for a healthy start, enjoy sunrise over a hearty breakfast or end the day taking a leisurely walk by the riverside. To kindle travelers’ business ideas on the go, the hotel also offers fully equipped large conference rooms, exquisite board rooms, a business center along with a rooftop outdoor terrace to add that extra zing, to your special events. Together with its personalized services, modern facilities and impeccable service standards, this hotel is a perfect place for the upbeat business and leisure traveler to interact and unwind. The hotel is just 15 minutes from the railway station and 20 minutes from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport. It is also in close proximity to major tourist attractions like the Gandhi Ashram as well as the shopping and commercial areas of CG Road in Navrangpura.

data.name: Novotel Ahmedabad Hotel
data.hotel_class_attribution: This property is classified according to Accor Hotels.
data.description: Featuring floor to ceiling windows, an open air swimming pool and spacious modern rooms, Novotel Ahmedabad is located on S G Highway. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. The Square, the in-house all day dining buffet restaurant serves Indian, Continental and Chinese fare. Room service can be requested for in-room dining comforts. Business Lounge can be accessed if booked on Deluxe room or above for complimentary tea/coffee and snacks. Hotel has The Liquor shop is open now. Hotel is a 21 km away from Sardar Vallabhai Patel International Airport. The Sanand industrial belt is located 16 km from Novotel Ahmedabad. Air-conditioned rooms will provide you with a flat-screen satellite TV, an electric kettle and a minibar. The attached bathrooms are equipped with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Novotel Ahmedabad offers a fitness center and operates a 24-hour front desk to assist guests at all hours. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage and dry cleaning.

data.name: Fortune Select SG Highway
data.hotel_class_attribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
data.description: A melting pot of Ahmedabad’s urban culture, Fortune Select SG Highway brings to you the city’s finest. Strategically located on the highway, this upscale hotel connects you to the important business landmarks and key destinations in and around Ahmedabad. A premium experience for astute business travelers or those looking for a relaxed vacation, it is an ideal place to warm your soul and lift your spirits. The hotel has some of the leading Corporate Houses in the vicinity along with the Leading Hospitals. This is one of the first hotels in Ahmedabad when you travel from Industrial hubs like Sanand, Changodar, Kadi, Kalol, Vithalapur, Bechraji and Gandhinagar. It is also easily accessible to the major Exhibition Venues like Mahatma Mandir, GUCEC and GMDC. It is near to Corporate Bhawan which houses the NCLT and Official Liquidator offices. Also, the hotel is very close to the Gujarat High court. Palladium Mall is coming up at just a stone throw away distance from the hotel and Ahmedabad One mall is not too far too. The hotel is very close to the many attractions of the city like Science City, Sabarmati Ashram, Law Garden, Adalaj Stepwell, Iscon Temple, etc. A contemporary hotel of 90 rooms and suites, the hotel is an elegant combination of European linear design and the deep roots of the traditional Gujarati themes. The ultra modern rooms with a great view are ideal for both business and leisure travelers. One can experience the hotel's award-winning and authentic South Indian Cuisine at “Dravida”, a vibrant Sunday brunch and a lively 24-hour coffee shop “Zodiac”. You can host an event in any of our versatile venues. Come immerse yourself in 5-star experience at Fortune Select SG Highway. Call the hotel for our representatives to provide you the best rates for any Social or Corporate events, City visits or Weekend Staycations.

data.description: The new state-of-the-art lobby at Courtyard by Marriott Ahmedabad Sindhu Bhavan Road offers our guests more freedom and options. Our all-day dining restaurant, Aura, is in the heart of it all. We have a variety of fresh and savoury breakfast and dinner options, as well as your favourite drinks. You'll also like the welcoming, flexible places where you can work or relax, free high-speed Wi-Fi throughout the hotel, and quick access to the latest news, weather, and airport conditions thanks to our Go-Board technology. In addition, our well-equipped exercise facility, indoor pool, and whirlpool will keep you motivated and refreshed. Whether you're visiting for business or pleasure, your stay at Courtyard Ahmedabad Sindhu Bhavan Road is likely to be more comfortable and rewarding.

data.name: The Ummed Ahmedabad
data.hotel_class_attribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
data.description: The Ummed Ahmedabad, located just 1 km from the airport and in close proximity to the government and developing industrial areas makes this location an apt choice. The Ummed Ahmedabad, is an oasis of warmth and soothing surroundings. Splashes of greens and blue welcome you to our elegantly designed, low-rise property spread over four acres of manicured gardens. The location of hotel is well connected to the old and new business districts of Ahmedabad. Gandhinagar, the state government's seat, is also a short 15 minute drive from the hotel. Feel welcomed in one of the 91 rooms and suites along with gives you a choice of indoor and outdoor venues to host your business or social events. The hotel boasts of ease of access, manicured gardens, world class amenities and customized food and beverage services to create the memorable events. Tastefully appointed using suitable tones, styled with custom made teak furniture and convenient amenities.

data.name: DoubleTree by Hilton Ahmedabad
data.hotel_class_attribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
data.description: Experience a warm welcome at our Ahmedabad hotel with a warm DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie. Our guest rooms are comfortable and contemporary with fresh design and floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the city. Upgrade to an Executive room for complimentary Executive Lounge access and stunning views from a higher floor. Suites include a separate living room, seating area, powder room, bathroom with shower and tub as well .Enjoy a lively breakfast, lunch or dinner showcasing Indian, Southeast Asian and Western flavors at our buffet-style restaurant with open kitchen, or enjoy the view and poolside music at our rooftop terrace. Grab a snack, tea or coffee from out lobby cafe and dine indoors or alfresco. Relax in one of our four spa treatment rooms and salon, or enjoy the rooftop pool and 24-hour fitness center. Meetings are easy with our six bright and airy conference rooms with modern equipment. Our pillarless Grand Ballroom is ideal for weddings, conferences or special events.

data.name: Rivera Sarovar Portico Ahmedabad
data.hotel_class_attribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
data.description: Hotel is situated bang on the Sabarmati Riverfront, Bhavan's college Road, Ahmedabad. Get a cordial reception at Sarovar Portico as you are introduced to this property that promises you every possible comfort and a world-class luxury. The entrance lobby itself is inviting with its wooden feel and plush furnishings. All the rooms and suites come with all of the best luxuries and a dedicated staff ensures that you are attended to anytime during the day. Extra care is taken to provide you with things to pamper you and keep you refreshed throughout the day. The hotel ensures that its guests are always comfortable and well-connected. Business tourists are even provided with the best of business facilities. The hotel even has the capacity to organize business conferences and meetings in its well-equipped conference halls. Dining is a priority for Sarovar. It has an amazing multi-cuisine restaurant that allows guests to enjoy delicious meals as they enjoy a lovely view of the gardens and the Sabarmati River.

data.name: Binori A Boutique Hotel
data.hotel_class_attribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
data.description: "Binori A Boutique Hotel" – Implements Gujarat’s Saga Culture & Tradition in a modern way. We promises to provide personalized service with genuine compassion & warmth which makes you feel that your stay has plus value for the money. Cafe Patio (Coffee Shop), Pol 21 (Multi-Cuisine Restaurant), Sachi (Grand Banquet Hall), Sarvam (Banquet Hall) & Board Room (For Conference) open for all guests. We have the perfect room to suit your needs – whether you are a business traveler who needs effortless luxury and impeccable round the clock service or a leisure visitor looking for a sense of tradition and timeless cultural indulgence. All the guest rooms are elegant and spacious that radiates luxury and feature large picture windows which frame the unmatched views of the city. A blend of Indian charm and modern understatement awaits you here. The hotel has 69 luxurious boutique rooms and suits inspired by the culture of Gujarat with modern neutral furnishings that are beautifully incorporated to showcase Ahmedabad regional culture and offer guests exceptional peace and harmony during their stay.

data.name: Radisson Blu Hotel Ahmedabad
data.hotel_class_attribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
data.description: LOCATIONRadisson Blu Hotel Ahmedabad is located in the city center in close proximity to the business and shopping hub at C.G. Road, S.G. Highway and Ashram Road. The hotel is 20 minutes’ drive from the airport and five minutes’ drive from Gujarat University exhibition /convention center and the Indian Institute of Management-Ahmedabad.GUEST ROOMSThe hotel houses 118 well-appointed guest rooms including Business Class Rooms, 8 Executive Suites, 6 spacious Business Class Suites and a Presidential Suite. The Business class rooms offer guests, upgraded amenities, services and benefits for them to indulge in luxury, elegance and comfort.DINING“Timpani” offers a combination of Indian, Continental and Chinese cuisine to suit every craving. Serves buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner and also a la carte throughout the day. A private dining room in the restaurant is a perfect spot for gathering of friends and family or business associates. “The Great Kabab Factory” is an iconic restaurant serving delectable kababs from all over the Indian subcontinent to one table. Besides kababs the menu includes rare gravy dishes and biryani, selection of Indian breads, best seasonal vegetables and desserts.SERVICESBusiness center supporting all secretarial needs of the guest with separate work stations and a board room. Complimentary Wired and Wireless internet connectivity in guest rooms, public areas and meeting spaces. A fitness center with state of the art equipment.MEETING FACILITIESAntra, Raag and one exclusive board room can accommodate conferences ranging from 25 to 300 guests with state-of-the-art modern conferencing equipment and facilities including the latest Audio Visual equipment. These meeting options are an ideal setting for a variety of corporate and social events.

data.name: Renaissance Ahmedabad Hotel
data.hotel_class_attribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

mobile.headline: Elevate And Enjoy
mobile.valid_days: Offer valid on the following days: .

data.description: Renaissance Ahmedabad a 5-star luxury hotel is located in the commercial district of S.G .highway in Ahmedabad. Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport is 14.3 km away, while the prominent business hubs like The Mahatma Mandir Convention Center is a 21.9 km, Akshardham Temple is 26 km drive away. Gujarat High Court is 700m, Intas 3.8 km, Zydus Hospital 3.3 km, Gandhinagar 21 km, Sanand 24 km and GIFT city 28 km from the property. Featuring contemporary rooms and sleek design, each room has artwork and is well-equipped with amenities like Wi-Fi, LED television, well-stocked mini-bar, in-room personal safe, tea/coffee maker, premium bedding, roomy work desk, blackout curtains, and full-length mirror. The bathroom is facilitated with hot/cold water supply, shower cubicle, robe and slippers, and exclusive bath essentials. The hotel features a rooftop outdoor infinity swimming pool with a sundeck for guests to unwind and relax. Guests can also work out at the well-equipped 24-hour fitness center. The in-house spa offers three treatment rooms. Other facilities include a 24-hour business center, laundry service, airport transfers, and doctor on call. Guest can enjoy 3 in-house dining options - R Kitchen, an all-day dining offers modern Indian and International flavors, Mill & Co. café is a stylish coffee shop for signature coffees, grab and go meals and beverages. Kuro – The Asian Bistro is our Pan Asian restaurant serving mix of Sichuan and Japanese cuisines to delight the guests. Further, guests may avail in-room dining facility. Guests can unwind at Club Lounge or conduct business meetings over coffee, tea and other beverages.

data.description: Wyndham Ahmedabad is truly a luxury property. The hotel is located just a few minutes drive from the various business hubs and around 30 minutes drive from the Ahmedabad Airport & Railway Station (27 Kms from the Airport and 22 Kms from the Railway Station). It has been built for comfortable & luxurious experience especially during large scale conferences and social engagements. With larger than life surroundings, convention facilities and state-of-the-art features, you will surely experience world class services with the touch of Indian hospitality. It is a much-preferred venue for business conferences, weddings, parties and social get-together. Wyndham Ahmedabad is located in close proximity to the prominent areas of the city. Airport - 30 minutes Prahladnagar - 15 minutes Sanand - 20 minutes Changodar - 20 minutes.

data.description: Fairfield by Marriott Ahmedabad, ideally located in the city centre of Ahmedabad, India, is the smart choice for savvy business and leisure travelers, offering a relaxed affordable and hassle-free stay every time. We are located on Ashram Road, in the heart of the commercial and shopping district with easy access to key sightseeing attractions. The historic Sabarmati Ashram (also known as Gandhi Ashram) adjoining to famous Ashram Road, at the bank of River Sabarmati, is 2 KM from the hotel. This was one of the residences of Mahatma Gandhi where he spent approximately 12 years of his life.

data.description: Fortune Park, Ahmedabad is a contemporary business hotel located centrally in one of the greenest areas of the city with excellent connectivity to the airport/ railway station, commercial zone and shopping hub. The hotel is strategically located near Ellis Bridge within short driving distance to the Sarkhej-Gandhinagar Highway (S.G. Road) which houses some of the leading corporate and also provides easy access to cutting-edge institutions like the Indian Institute of Management Ahmedabad (IIMA), the Mudra Institute of Communications (MICA), National Institute of Design (NID), Gujarat Vidyapeeth and the Nirma University of Science and Technology. The hotel offers comfortable accommodation, a round the clock dining outlet, choice of banqueting venues along with warm and efficient service.

data.name: WelcomHeritage Mani Mansion
data.hotel_class_attribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
data.description: Mani Mansion previously knowns as "CORPORATE SUITES" was born out of a vision to preserve the rich cultural heritage associated to the ancestral home of the Dalal family. From an ancestral haveli, the owners have suitably modified the property to evolve into one of the city's finest heritage hotels. Situated in the heart of the city, the grand haveli turned Heritage Hotel offers a serene ambience that allows every traveler to enjoy a comfortable home stay. With an array of rooms tastefully furnished to match the urbane demands of today's traveler, we at Mani Mansion take extra care to address all your needs for a comfortable staying experience. A first of its kind concept, the premises consists of 21 different Suites that come packed with unique features like a mini kitchenette to a complimentary Wi-Fi usage for all the guests. In spite of these urbane facilities, we guarantee all our guests personalized attention and a unique stay that equates to a home away from a home impression. But apart from these many facilities that will ensure your comfortable stay, we at Mani Mansion, offer you a unique opportunity to come and experience the grandeur of a heritage property. From a 25 feet ceiling and architecture that clearly speaks volume about the rich lineage of culture associated with the city of Ahmedabad to 70 year old fans, uniqueness is inherent in every feature at Mani Mansion. Staying at Mani Mansion keeps you away from the regular hustle-bustle in spite of being in the heart of the city. In fact, Mani Mansion has also received heritage property stature from the Govt. of Gujarat. We invite you to be a part of this exclusive experience by staying with us and enjoying the beauty and grandeur of one of Amdavad's finest properties.

data.name: Regenta Central Antarim
data.hotel_class_attribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
data.description: Regenta Central Antarim Hotel is a home base for an urban lifestyle, combining intelligently planned spaces with indefinite comfort under the umbrella of the vintage city-escapades. In a Heritage town, it breaks the boundaries between the old and the new, the past and the present by securing all the state-of-the-art amenities while remaining true to 'Amdavad's' roots. The purposeful design expanse holds tranquility in its arms among the ingredients of a good night's sleep. You will fall in love with everything we have to offer alongside being introduced to a city that holds affection for all in its every nook and corner. Rooms at Regenta Central Antarim Each room is composed with tasteful decor overlooking the neighborhood that is always brimming with life and splendour. The impeccable rooms are equipped with all the requirements of a modern traveler alongside unique features of the city's heritage in each room that will keep your stay pleasant and fresh every time. Dining at Regenta Central Antarim The blissful restaurant options - Artisan. A stop at our patisserie alongside our mini-library will allow you to sip coffee, polish off succulent treats while flipping pages to a book or the local newspapers before you set off to explore the city. Meetings & Weddings at Regenta Central Antarim Antarim furthermore provides 6 remarkable conference and banqueting options tailored for any event you may wish us to host.
